title: [1.11索引]核心/基础/辅助/冒险/工具[目前数量:83]
txt_content:
本帖最后由 317620111 于 2017-6-15 12:41 编辑 
前言
这也是我第一次做索引，有什么不好的地方请指出，谢谢！
Mod下的注释仅代表我个人意见！

注：Mod下方链接只有Curse的说明该Mod站内没有搬运.Mod下方链接站内和站外都有说明站内版本较新或最新。该索引不录入API/Mod核心Mod。最近论坛抽风挺厉害...

一、辅助类Mod
小地图[4]
1.JourneyMap[旅行地图]
http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-612917-1-1.html
2.Voxelmap[体素地图]http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-473187-1-1.html
3.Xaero’s World Map[Xaero的世界地图]
http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-616156-1-1.html

4.Xaero‘s Minimap[Xaero的迷你地图]
http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-545145-1-1.html

信息显示Mod[6]
1.Waila Harvestability[Waila的更多信息]
注：此Mod附属于Hwyla或Waila
https://mods.curse.com/mc-mods/minecraft/waila-harvestability

2.Hwyla[这是？你在看什么]
http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-648893-1-1.html

3.AppleSkin[苹果核]
https://minecraft.curseforge.com/projects/appleskin
http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-637587-1-1.html

4.The One Probe
https://minecraft.curseforge.com/projects/the-one-probe

5.InGame Info XML[游戏内信息显示]https://minecraft.curseforge.com/projects/ingame-info-xml
http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-469528-1-1.html6.OreDictionaryConverter[矿石词典转换器]https://minecraft.curseforge.com/projects/oredictionaryconverter
功能辅助Mod[9]
1.Just Enough Items (JEI)
注：类似于NEI的功能强大的辅助Mod
https://minecraft.curseforge.com/projects/just-enough-items-jeihttp://www.mcbbs.net/thread-660463-1-1.html

2.Item Scroller
注：类似于鼠标手势的一个Mod
https://mods.curse.com/mc-mods/minecraft/242064-item-scroller

3.VeinMiner[矿脉矿工]
http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-387183-1-1.html

4.Mercurius
注：挖矿辅助的一个Mod
https://mods.curse.com/mc-mods/minecraft/242838-mercurius#t1:description

5.Just Enough Resources (JER)[JEI附属]https://minecraft.curseforge.com/projects/just-enough-resources-jer
http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-626733-1-1.html

6.Mouse Tweaks[鼠标手势]https://minecraft.curseforge.com/projects/mouse-tweaks

7.KleeSlabs[更好的破坏半砖]
https://minecraft.curseforge.com/projects/kleeslabs
http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-566538-1-1.html
8.Mod Name Tooltip[模组来源提示]https://minecraft.curseforge.com/projects/mod-name-tooltiphttp://www.mcbbs.net/thread-572024-1-1.html
9.Torcherino[加速火把]https://minecraft.curseforge.com/projects/torcherinohttp://www.mcbbs.net/thread-615324-1-1.html
10.Ore Excavationhttp://www.mcbbs.net/thread-648189-1-1.html

视听特效Mod[4]
1.Ding[界面进入提醒]
https://minecraft.curseforge.com/projects/ding
http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-570409-1-1.html2.Sound Filters[声音滤器]https://minecraft.curseforge.com/projects/sound-filtershttp://www.mcbbs.net/thread-315692-1-1.html
3.EiraMoticons[表情]https://minecraft.curseforge.com/projects/eiramoticons
4.Audio Death[死亡音乐]https://minecraft.curseforge.com/projects/audio-death

优化补丁Mod[8]
1.[原创]No Mob Spawning on Trees[树枝树干不刷怪]
http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-382572-1-1.html
https://minecraft.curseforge.com/projects/no-mob-spawning-on-trees

2.BetterAchievements[更好的成就]
https://minecraft.curseforge.com/projects/betterachievements
http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-612828-1-1.html

3.Custom Main Menu[自定义主菜单]https://minecraft.curseforge.com/projects/custom-main-menu
http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-514791-1-1.html

4.[服务器Mod]FastLeafDecay[树叶迅速掉落]https://minecraft.curseforge.com/projects/fastleafdecay
5.[原创]卡地狱门修正[NetherPortalFix]http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-637324-1-1.html
6.[原创]TAB头像破解[TabIconHack]http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-635603-1-1.html
7.BetterFps[更好的FPS]http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-539780-1-1.html
8.CompatLayer注：可以使1.10与1.11的Mod兼容https://minecraft.curseforge.com/projects/compatlayer
自定义修改[8]1.[原创]万用皮肤补丁[CustomSkinLoader]http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-269807-1-1.html
2.BetterBedrockGen[更好的基岩]http://minecraft.curseforge.com/projects/betterbedrockgen
3.Better Questing[冒险任务系统]http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-643569-1-1.html
4.Custom NPCs[自定义NPC]http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-592910-1-1.html
5.Enchiridion[手册]注：这个Mod适用于整合包制作者。https://minecraft.curseforge.com/projects/enchiridion
6.WorldEdit[创世神]https://minecraft.curseforge.com/projects/worldedithttp://www.mcbbs.net/thread-422617-1-1.html
7.CraftTweaker[合成修改]https://minecraft.curseforge.com/projects/crafttweakerhttp://mcbbs.tvt.im/thread-649399-1-1.html
8.Quark[夸克]https://minecraft.curseforge.com/projects/quarkhttp://mcbbs.tvt.im/thread-648145-1-1.html二、核心Mod
科技Mod[9]1.RFTools[RF工具]
https://minecraft.curseforge.com/projects/rftools
http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-416167-1-1.html

2.Forestry[林业]https://minecraft.curseforge.com/projects/forestry
http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-576339-1-1.html

3.Deep Resonance
https://minecraft.curseforge.com/projects/deep-resonance

4.Environmental Tech[高新技术]http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-644622-1-1.html
5.TechReborn[科技重生]http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-482885-1-1.htmlhttps://minecraft.curseforge.com/projects/techreborn
6.Advanced Generators[高级发电机]https://minecraft.curseforge.com/projects/advanced-generators
7.OpenComputers[开放式电脑]https://minecraft.curseforge.com/projects/opencomputershttp://mcbbs.tvt.im/thread-618383-1-1.html
8.Extreme Reactors[极限反应堆]https://minecraft.curseforge.com/projects/extreme-reactorshttp://mcbbs.tvt.im/thread-639696-1-1.html
9.Industrial Craft[工业]注：这个Mod竟然没人接坑.https://minecraft.curseforge.com/projects/industrial-craft
魔法Mod[1]1.Reliquary[圣遗物]https://minecraft.curseforge.com/projects/reliquary-v1-3

冒险Mod[3]1.Roguelike Dungeons[冒险地牢]https://minecraft.curseforge.com/projects/roguelike-dungeons
http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-300785-1-1.html2.ArmorPlushttps://minecraft.curseforge.com/projects/armorplus
3.AbyssalCraft[深渊国度]http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-661912-1-1.html

三、非核心Mod
装饰类Mod[1]1.Flat Colored Blocks注：哇！一个调色板！
https://minecraft.curseforge.com/projects/flat-colored-blocks

建筑/地牢生成类Mod[1]1.Platforms[平台]https://minecraft.curseforge.com/projects/platforms
http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-611880-1-1.html


地形/资源生成类Mod[4]1.Biomes O' Plenty[更多生物群系]https://minecraft.curseforge.com/projects/biomes-o-plenty
http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-534906-1-1.html

2.Dense Ores[密集矿石]
https://minecraft.curseforge.com/projects/dense-ores
3.Natura[大自然]https://minecraft.curseforge.com/projects/natura
4.Biomes O' Plenty[超多生物群系]https://minecraft.curseforge.com/projects/biomes-o-plenty
生物[2]1.Bloodmoon[血月]https://minecraft.curseforge.com/projects/bloodmoonhttp://www.mcbbs.net/thread-439615-1-1.html
2.AtomicStryker's Infernal Mobs[稀有怪物]https://minecraft.curseforge.com/projects/atomicstrykers-infernal-mobs
储存类Mod[6]1.Storage Drawers[储物抽屉]https://minecraft.curseforge.com/projects/storage-drawers
http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-537525-1-1.html

2.Iron Chests
https://minecraft.curseforge.com/projects/iron-chests

3.Refined Storage[精致储存]
注：一个很棒的高科技储存Mod。
https://minecraft.curseforge.com/projects/refined-storage

4.GraveStone Mod[墓碑]
https://minecraft.curseforge.com/projects/gravestone-mod
http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-612918-1-1.html

5.EnderTanks
https://minecraft.curseforge.com/projects/endertanks6.MultiStorage[多样化储存]http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-646324-1-1.html

装备工具类Mod[1]1.Chisels & Bits[凿子]
https://minecraft.curseforge.com/projects/chisels-bits

功能性方块类Mod[10]1.Actually Additions[实用拓展]http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-614201-1-1.html

2.Better Builder's Wands[更好的建筑魔杖]
https://minecraft.curseforge.com/projects/better-builders-wands
http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-579351-1-1.html

3.Not Enough Wands
注：这是关于魔杖的Mod
https://minecraft.curseforge.com/projects/not-enough-wands

4.Random Things[随意作品]
https://minecraft.curseforge.com/projects/random-things
http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-417268-1-1.html

5.Chance Cubes[机会方块]
https://minecraft.curseforge.com/projects/chance-cubes
http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-631168-1-1.html

6.Chest Transporter[搬箱器]https://minecraft.curseforge.com/projects/chest-transporter
http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-467680-1-1.html
7.Super Crafting Frame[超级合成框架]https://minecraft.curseforge.com/projects/super-crafting-framehttp://www.mcbbs.net/thread-588838-1-1.html
8.Morph-o-Tool[变形工具]https://minecraft.curseforge.com/projects/morph-o-tool
9.OpenBlocks Elevator[方块电梯]https://minecraft.curseforge.com/projects/openblocks-elevatorhttp://www.mcbbs.net/thread-632133-1-1.html
10.Pressure Pipes[压力管道]https://minecraft.curseforge.com/projects/pressure-pipeshttp://www.mcbbs.net/thread-320137-1-1.html

饮食类Mod[1]1.Cooking for Blockheads[烹饪书]https://minecraft.curseforge.com/projects/cooking-for-blockheadshttp://mcbbs.tvt.im/thread-545680-1-1.html
杂项类Mod[5]1.Soul Shards: The Old Ways
注：偏向于魔法的一个获得钻石的小Mod
https://minecraft.curseforge.com/projects/soul-shards-the-old-wayshttp://www.mcbbs.net/thread-659960-1-1.html

2.Ranged Pumps
注：增加了在岩浆里获得能量的泵
https://minecraft.curseforge.com/projects/ranged-pumps

3.Experience Rings[经验指环]https://minecraft.curseforge.com/projects/experience-rings
http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-630069-1-1.html4.Karat Gardenhttp://www.mcbbs.net/thread-663378-1-1.htmlhttps://minecraft.curseforge.com/projects/karat-garden
5.Cyclic [循环]https://minecraft.curseforge.com/projects/cyclic#http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-648189-1-1.html
